{/* Hero / Intro */}

About Us

GalaxyEDGE Safety Inc.

At GalaxyEDGE Safety Inc. (GESI), we are redefining global health and safety standards through innovation, digital transformation, and immersive learning technologies. Our mission is to lead the industry by integrating AI-powered safety solutions, cutting-edge digital tools, and accessible training programs to create safer, smarter workplaces worldwide.

{/* Mission / Vision / Values */}

Mission

To integrate AI-powered safety solutions, cutting-edge digital tools, and accessible training programs to create safer, smarter workplaces worldwide.

Vision

Empower businesses, professionals, and workers with the tools and knowledge needed to navigate the rapidly evolving safety landscape.

Values

Innovation · Integrity · Collaboration · Excellence in delivering high-impact, scalable safety solutions.

{/* Founder Profile */}

Lisa McGuire, ICD.D, CRSP

A recognized leader in occupational health and safety, with over 17 years of executive experience driving industry transformation, digital innovation, and global standardization. As Founder & CEO of the Manufacturing Safety Alliance of BC (MSABC), Lisa spearheaded a 40% reduction in injury rates and grew membership from 800 to 3,000 businesses. She also launched Safety Meta World—game-based VR training that boosted effectiveness by 60%.

17+ years experience
3,000 member businesses
